purpleculture_pinyin:
chǔ
to store; to save; to have in reserve; heir; Taiwan pr. [chu2]
хранить; сохранить; иметь в запасе; наследник; Тайвань пр. [chu2]
rtega_mnemonic:
儲儲RS
储储		save money, store, reserve, an heir
  • person saying things 諸 to another person 亻: bank clerk recommending that the client will save money
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 储)
Pictophonetic: 諸 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
儲備 [ chǔ bèi ]: reserves; to store up
儲蓄 [ chǔ xù ]: to deposit money; to save; savings
儲量 [ chǔ liàng ]: remaining quantity; reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
儲存 [ chǔ cún ]: stockpile; to store; to stockpile; storage

Ru_trainchinese:
chǔ: (глаг) запасать, сберегать
chǔ: (сущ) наследник престола
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) makes various (諸) profits
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T has various gold chains which he is forced to put in storage for safety.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " all ", the original meaning is accumulation and storage. "Han Feizi‧ Ten Passes": "There is no accumulation of millets in the warehouse, no money in the mansion, no soldiers in the library, and no defensive equipment in the town."

" Chu " can mean waiting. "Shuowen": "Yiye. From people, all voices." "Wenxuan‧ Zhang Heng <Tokyo Fu>": "Combined and clipped, stored in Guangting." Xue Zong's note: "Carry, wait. Broad, big Yeah. It is said that Zhang set up in the big court to wait for the emperor."

" Chu " also means the prince and prince. "Han Shu·Shuguang Zhuan": "The prince, the vice-prince of the state reserve, the teachers and friends must be handsome in the world."

" Chu " also expressed assistance. "Wen Xuan-Zuo Si "Wei Du Fu"": "After Ya Yizhu, the law-enforcement servant, the fujie ye, the official official of the official seal." Li Zhouhan's note: "The official official of the official seal, the emperor seals the seal."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " all ", it means accumulation and storage.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「諸」聲，本義為蓄積、儲存。《韓非子‧十過》：「倉無積粟，府無儲錢，庫無甲兵，邑無守具。」

　　「儲」可表示等待。《說文》：「偫也。从人，諸聲。」《文選‧張衡〈東京賦〉》：「并夾既設，儲乎廣庭。」薛綜注：「儲，待也。廣，大也。謂張設於大庭以待天子也。」

　　「儲」也表示儲君、太子。《漢書‧疏廣傳》：「太子，國儲副君，師友必於天下英俊。」

　　「儲」還表示輔佐。《文選‧左思〈魏都賦〉》：「亞以柱後，執法內侍，符節謁者，典璽儲吏。」李周翰注：「典璽儲吏，掌天子印璽。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「諸」聲，表示蓄積、儲存。

從「 人 」，「 諸 」聲，本義為蓄積、儲存。《韓非子‧十過》：「倉無積粟，府無儲錢，庫無甲兵，邑無守具。」 「 儲 」可表示等待。《說文》：「偫也。从人，諸聲。」《文選‧張衡〈東京賦〉》：「并夾既設，儲乎廣庭。」薛綜注：「儲，待也。廣，大也。謂張設於大庭以待天子也。」 「 儲 」也表示儲君、太子。《漢書‧疏廣傳》：「太子，國儲副君，師友必於天下英俊。」 「 儲 」還表示輔佐。《文選‧左思〈魏都賦〉》：「亞以柱後，執法內侍，符節謁者，典璽儲吏。」李周翰注：「典璽儲吏，掌天子印璽。」
From the sound of " person" and " all", the original meaning is accumulation and storage. "Han Feizi‧ Ten Passes": "There is no accumulation of millets in the warehouse, no money in the mansion, no soldiers in the library, and no defensive equipment in the town." " Chu" can mean waiting. "Shuowen": "Yiye. From people, all voices." "Wenxuan‧ Zhang Heng": "Combined and clipped, stored in Guangting." Xue Zong's note: "Carry, wait. Broad, big Yeah. It is said that Zhang set up in the big court to wait for the emperor." " Chu" also means the prince and prince. "Han Shu·Shuguang Zhuan": "The prince, the vice-prince of the state reserve, the teachers and friends must be handsome in the world." " Chu" also expressed assistance. "Wen Xuan-Zuo Si "Wei Du Fu"": "After Ya Yizhu, the law-enforcement servant, the fujie ye, the official official of the official seal." Li Zhouhan's note: "The official official of the official seal, the emperor seals the seal."

儲字的基本解释

儲
chǔ
见“储”。

儲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǔ］
［《廣韻》直魚切，平魚，澄。］
“储1”的繁体字。
(1)蓄积；儲存。
(2)指储存的粮食或其他物资。
(3)指贮粮器。
(4)置备；聚集。
(5)等待。
(6)储君，太子。
(7)副，辅佐。参见“儲吏”、“儲佐”。
(8)夸大，欺诳。参见“儲價”。
(9)见“儲與”。
(10)姓。汉有储大伯。见《後汉书·鲍永传》。

儲字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　儲； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页121第20
【廣韻】直魚切【集韻】【韻會】?如切【正韻】長魚切，?音除。偫也。【淮南子·主術訓】十八年而有六年之積，二十七年而有九年之儲。　又副也。【南齊書】太子曰東儲。　又儲胥，猶言御苑也。【張衡·西京賦】旣新作于迎風，加露寒與儲胥。【註】武帝先作迎風館，後加露寒，儲胥二館。　又儲與，卽容與。【淮南子·俶眞訓】儲與扈冶。一作諸與。【揚雄·羽獵賦】儲與乎大浦，聊浪乎宇內。【服虔曰】儲與，相羊也。與，音餘。聊浪，放浪也。　又姓。

儲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
儲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Store
chǔ
See "Storage".
Store
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chǔ]
["Guangyun" cut straight fish, flat fish, clear. ]
Traditional characters for "Storage 1".
(1) Accumulation; storage.
(2) Refers to stored grain or other materials.
(3) Refers to grain storage device.
(4) Provision; gather.
(5) Wait.
(6) The prince and the prince.
(7) Deputy, assistant. See "Chu Official", "Chu Zuo".
(8) Exaggerate and deceive. See "storage price".
(9) See "Storage and".
(10) Last name. Han has Uncle Chu. See "Book of the Later Han·Bao Yong Biography".
Store
